channel.title: Comments on: Nakatomi: your portal to community-based social aggregation

item.title: By: Brian McAuliffe
item.dc:creator: Brian McAuliffe
item.description: Us folks down in Cork launched something.ie last month. similar concept, based around communities, blogging, etc.
item.content:encoded: Us folks down in Cork launched something.ie last month. similar concept, based around communities, blogging, etc.

item.title: By: Nakatomi Plaza » Blog Archive » Announcing Skypod
item.dc:creator: Nakatomi Plaza » Blog Archive » Announcing Skypod
item.description: [...] We were recently featured on the Web 2.0 Ireland blog, but we were surprised that they did not invite us along to their recent event — we actually only found out about it only through Desâ€™s contacts in academia. Work on Skypod kept us away this year, but judging by the blog posts and some of the exhibitors it seems like an amazing event. Hopefully weâ€™ll be able to attend next year! [...]

item.title: By: Des Traynor
